name: Horns and Scrolls
description:
Premise:     

        In this game, you play as a medieval peasant who has been tasked with finding two sacred items by the local priest. This is a short combat-focused experience with two full levels. 

      Instructions

         Unzip and play.

         If you press new game, your character will appear in a church. You must then walk up towards the priest and press F to start the dialogue.

         If you press level select you can select either level and start the game immediately.
